title: ricker40
author: ricker40
created_time: December 07, 2022, 01:32:05 PMLast edit: December 07, 2022, 01:57:37 PM by ricker40
content: Hi,We all know how frustrating it is how every exchange is requiring KYC nowadays.We're offering the opportunity to buy BTC for USD through bank transfer, without KYC.Few details:Min. 500$Max. 200k$Personal and Biz Us accountMethod: Wire, SEPA, Worldwide Bank Transfer, Payoneer, Wise.Fees: 37%Currency: EUR/GBP/USDAvailable Crypto: BTC/ETH/USDT/USDCPM ME

comments.author: netinfra
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on December 19, 2022, 08:50:51 PM37% will never happen.It is amusing to see how a "bunch of people" think they will catch some unwary person even if they impose fees that even the worst bank wouldn't impose on you.

comments.author: larry_vw_1955
comments.body: Quote from: netinfra on December 30, 2022, 10:07:32 AMQuote from: alterra57 on December 19, 2022, 08:50:51 PM37% will never happen.It is amusing to see how a "bunch of people" think they will catch some unwary person even if they impose fees that even the worst bank wouldn't impose on you.alot of new users posting in this thread. including the OP

comments.body: Quote from: larry_vw_1955 on January 09, 2023, 04:06:15 AMalot of new users posting in this thread. including the OP   Hey, do we have to ask you for permission to post in a thread as a new user?

comments.body: Quote from: netinfra on January 12, 2023, 06:56:30 PMQuote from: larry_vw_1955 on January 09, 2023, 04:06:15 AMalot of new users posting in this thread. including the OP   Hey, do we have to ask you for permission to post in a thread as a new user?   so I did some detective work and what I found out is that you created your acct on Dec 3 and the OP on Dec 7. very interesting.   have you ever sold bitcoin before? just wondering.
